wordGroup: acupuncture and moxibustion 针灸；针灸疗法；针灸科

sentences.en: I had acupuncture in my lower back.
Acupuncture treatment is gentle, painless, and relaxing.
sentences.cn: 针灸治疗很温和，无痛，也很放松。

sentences.en: Acupuncture has a harmonizing and energizing effect on mind and body.
sentences.cn: 针灸疗法有协调和激活身心的功效。
